docs.lead_paragraph: This animation discusses and depicts several aspects of the lymphatic system including a microscopic view of lymph formation, edema, breast lymphatics and the spread of breast cancer.
docs.snippet: This animation discusses and depicts several aspects of the lymphatic system including a microscopic view of lymph formation, edema, breast lymphatics and the spread of breast cancer.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation provides a general overview of the nervous system and shows the process in which nerve impulses are transmitted.
docs.snippet: This animation provides a general overview of the nervous system and shows the process in which nerve impulses are transmitted.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animations shows the head receiving two impacts. One on the front, and one on the side from a boxing glove.
docs.snippet: This animations shows the head receiving two impacts. One on the front, and one on the side from a boxing glove.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a cerebral aneurysm growing and rupturing filling the brain with blood.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a cerebral aneurysm growing and rupturing filling the brain with blood.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation highlights the major sections of the brain and explains their primary functions.
docs.snippet: This animation highlights the major sections of the brain and explains their primary functions.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the prostate gland and its surrounding structures and shows the effects of benign prostatic hypertrophy (BPH).
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the prostate gland and its surrounding structures and shows the effects of benign prostatic hypertrophy (BPH).

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the location of basal ganglia in the brain. Injury to the basal ganglia may result in athetosis (constant writhing movements of the body).
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the location of basal ganglia in the brain. Injury to the basal ganglia may result in athetosis (constant writhing movements of the body).

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation highlights the structures of the male reproductive system and the pathway of ejaculate. A testicle is sectioned and enlarged to depict its internal anatomy, including a microscopic view of individual sperm.
docs.snippet: This animation highlights the structures of the male reproductive system and the pathway of ejaculate. A testicle is sectioned and enlarged to depict its internal anatomy, including a microscopic view of individual sperm.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation highlights from a mid-sagittal view the structures of the male reproductive system and the pathway of ejaculate. A testicle is sectioned and enlarged to depict its internal anatomy, including a microscopic view of individual sperm.
docs.snippet: This animation highlights from a mid-sagittal view the structures of the male reproductive system and the pathway of ejaculate. A testicle is sectioned and enlarged to depict its internal anatomy, including a microscopic view of individual sperm.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows a vasectomy procedure.
docs.snippet: This animation shows a vasectomy procedure.
